subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony had 30 points but shot just 10 of 28 from the field for the Knicks, while the Pacers’ Paul George scored 21 of his game-high 35 points in the fourth quarter and overtime.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony had 30 points but shot just 10 of 28 from the field for the Knicks, while the Pacers’ Paul George scored 21 of his game-high 35 points in the fourth quarter and overtime.
